Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Vase for cosmetics
Description: Vase for cosmetics with a flat, slightly flaring base and a tall, globular body. The lip is flat and separated from the side of the vase by a line all around the neck. The entire surface of the vase, including the underside of the base, is covered by a blue-green varnish.
